name: Magic Blender
description:
A great adventure begins.

Learn from the great wizard in your quest for knowledge of magic. You who continue the saga ?

Mix potions and progresses through a magical world of floating islands.

Different scenarios await you: Forest Island, Ice island, Purple desert Island, Lake Village Island, Volcano Island .... and more to come.

100 Levels.

It is completely free to play.

Join the adventure of the old and candy magic.

A fresh Match 3 of potions with bubbles.

The jewels of a mythical land await you.

Collect herbs to create powerful potions. These plants are as powerful as a diamond or gems to the Great Wizard.

Create combos and crushes the Score.

Become the king of magic.

Do not wait for the second part ... that surely will be worse .... TEST IT FIRST !!!!

v 2.0.78 - Added Play Game Services - New menus - Achievements - Leaderboards - Save/Load Game (To sync your progress between devices).
